unnormalised: ## Rental Agreements: Don't Get Fooled, Yaar!
normalised: ## Rental Agreements: Do Not Get Fooled, Friend!

unnormalised: Hey Mumbai! Landlord woes got you down? Before you sign that rental agreement and hand over your hard-earned Rs. 50,000 deposit, listen up! A new report from the Indian Institute of Property Law highlights some seriously dodgy clauses cropping up.
normalised: Hey Mumbai! Landlord woes got you down? Before you sign that rental agreement and hand over your hard-earned rupee fifty thousand deposit, listen up! A new report from the Indian Institute of Property Law highlights some seriously dodgy clauses cropping up.

unnormalised: Apparently, some landlords are slipping in sneaky terms, like charging tenants for building maintenance (that's their job, bhai!). And Dr. Sharma, a legal expert, warns about agreements that drastically increase rent after just 6 months.
normalised: Apparently, some landlords are slipping in sneaky terms, like charging tenants for building maintenance (that is their job, brother!). And Doctor Sharma, a legal expert, warns about agreements that drastically increase rent after just six months.

unnormalised: Make sure you read the fine print! Check clauses related to repairs, notice periods, and who pays for what. Also, photograph EVERYTHING before you move in – scratches, stains, the lot!
normalised: Make sure you read the fine print! Check clauses related to repairs, notice periods, and who pays for what. Also, photograph everything before you move in – scratches, stains, the lot!

unnormalised: Remember that cute 1BHK in Bandra offering 600 sq ft for just Rs. 20,000? Sounds too good to be true? It probably is! Get it verified.
normalised: Remember that cute one B H K in Bandra offering six hundred square feet for just rupee twenty thousand? Sounds too good to be true? It probably is! Get it verified.

unnormalised: Don't be afraid to negotiate terms you're not happy with. It’s your right! Happy hunting, and remember, a little caution goes a long way in protecting your pocket! Renting shouldn't feel like dealing with your phupha ji at a wedding!
normalised: Do not be afraid to negotiate terms you are not happy with. It is your right! Happy hunting, and remember, a little caution goes a long way in protecting your pocket! Renting should not feel like dealing with your phupha ji at a wedding!
